Headline: සමාජ විරෝධී අය ඡන්දෙට එපා කියන සනත් නිශාන්ත (අඟහ කාටූන්)
News Content: සමාජ විරෝධී අය ඡන්දෙට එපා කියන සනත් නිශාන්ත (අඟහ කාටූන්)

comments.comment: Every politician admits that there are politicians involved in corruption except himself.But no politician so far has been held accountable for any corruption.Nepotism and cronyism in the political arena during the past seven decades are another major factors that made the country one of the poorest country in Asia,struggle against these evils were brutally suppressed. But recent unresolved killings for what purpose ?
